languages.text: {n}Абеляр собирается возразить, но, заметив вашу отстраненность, лишь молча скрещивает руки.{/n}
{n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр собирается возразить, но, заметив вашу отстраненность, лишь молча скрещивает руки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}
{n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

{n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}
{n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德似乎想要反驳些什么，但看到你的冷漠态度之后，他只是叉起了双手，一言不发。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德似乎想要反驳些什么，但看到你的冷漠态度之后，他只是叉起了双手，一言不发。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard parece querer protestar, pero, al ver tu desinterés se limita a cruzar los brazos en silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard parece querer protestar, pero, al ver tu desinterés se limita a cruzar los brazos en silencio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは異議を唱えたがっているようだが、こちらのそっけない態度を見て、何も言わずにただ腕を組む。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは異議を唱えたがっているようだが、こちらのそっけない態度を見て、何も言わずにただ腕を組む。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard würde wohl gerne widersprechen, doch als er deine Unnahbarkeit bemerkt, verschränkt er lediglich die Arme und schweigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard würde wohl gerne widersprechen, doch als er deine Unnahbarkeit bemerkt, verschränkt er lediglich die Arme und schweigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abélard semble vouloir intervenir, mais voyant votre détachement, il se contente de croiser les bras sans rien dire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard semble vouloir intervenir, mais voyant votre détachement, il se contente de croiser les bras sans rien dire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Abelard itiraz etmek istermiş gibi dursa da mesafeli duruşunu görünce hiçbir şey söylemeden kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks like he wants to object, but, seeing your aloofness, simply crosses his arms without saying a word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard itiraz etmek istermiş gibi duruyor ancak mesafeli duruşunu görünce hiçbir şey söylemeden kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n}
